name: B. Sasha and the Drawing
statement:
Even in kindergarten, Sasha liked a girl. Therefore, he wanted to give
her a drawing and attract her attention.As a drawing, he decided to draw
a square grid of size n
times n, in which some cells are colored. But coloring the cells is
difficult, so he wants to color as few cells as possible. But at the
same time, he wants k diagonals to have at least one colored cell. Note
that the square grid of size n
times n has a total of 4n - 2 diagonals.Help little Sasha to make the
girl fall in love with him and tell him the minimum number of cells he
needs to color.
